Subsection.title: Definition
Subsection.Paragraph: The end section indicates the end of an SMF/B file.

Subsection.title: Cardinality/Ordering
Subsection.Paragraph: An end section must appear exactly once in an SMF/B file.
The end section MUST be the last section in an SMF/B file. Implementations MUST reject SMF/B files that do not contain a terminating end section.

Subsection.title: Magic Number
Subsection.Paragraph: The end section is identified by the magic number 0x534D465F454E4421.

Subsection.title: Data
Subsection.Paragraph: The end section contains no data. The specified data size for the section MUST be 0.
